item.title: Java Get All Interfaces of a Class using Apache Commons Lang
item.description: This Java tutorial shows you how to get a list of all interfaces that are implemented by a given class and its superclasses using the ClassUtils of Apache Commons Lang library. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); How to add Apache Commons Lang 3 library to your Java project To use the Apache Commons Lang 3 library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.
